Name: Battle Imagine - Void Arachnocrab
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Void Arachnocrab's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Shell Defense.

Stunt! Shell Defense
Transform into Elite: Void Arachnocrab, rendering yourself invincible for 5s.

Stunt! Shell Defense

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
